titleStmt.title: The debt book: or, A treatise vpon Romans 13. ver. 8 Wherein is handled: the ciuill debt of money or goods, and vnder it the mixt debt, as occasion is offered. Also, the sacred debt of loue. By Henry Wilkinson, Bachelor in Diuinity, and pastor of Wadesdon in Buckinghamshire.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Henry, 1566-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. B[adger] and G. M[iller] for Robert Bird, and are to be sold in Cheap-side at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Cheap-side at the signe of the Bible
